name: Manufacturer
description: creation or production of goods with the help of equipment, labor, machines, tools, and chemical or biological processing or formulation.

name: Distributor
description: person or company that buys products from a manufacturer and sells them for a profit to other businesses, stores, or customers

name: Retailer
description: someone who owns or manages a store or website that sells goods to the public

name: Service Provider
description: A service provider (SP) is an organization that provides services, such as consulting, legal, real estate

name: Wholeseller
description: a person or company that sells goods in large quantities to other companies or people who then sell them to the public
